About me

I love building new products and reimagining what’s possible.

Professionally, I’ve worked on large-scale developer platforms, productivity software and novel blockchain applications. At the same time, I’ve shipped a few developer tools and social networks of my own

Recently, I’ve been most interested in:

  • Platforms and developer strategy
  • Workflow automation and productivity tools
  • The future of payments
  • Location-aware social apps
